__e: Cara, I know how hard this is, and I need you to tell us exactly what happened.
But then when I got to New York, I thought how much you love me and how hard that must have been for you.
I know how difficult it is for you to see the scope of what we're doing here, but that's why I need the three of you.
And in fact, I don't think that any of us down there have an idea of how hard it's been for you people.
Granny. - Let me also see how much pain he can give me. "Let me see, how much hard hearted he can be."
I knew what was best for me... moving forward, no matter how hard.
